sentence.Network_en: An attempt by anti-abortionists to tighten the rules was defeated.
sentence.Network_cn: 反堕胎者所作的加强法规的尝试失败了。

sentence.Network_en: The United States plans to tighten the economic sanctions currently in place.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国计划加大现有经济制裁的力度。

sentence.Network_en: I used my thumbnail to tighten the screw on my lamp.
sentence.Network_cn: 我用拇指指甲把台灯上的螺钉拧紧了。

entry.def: If you tighten your grip on something, or if your grip tightens, you hold the thing more firmly or securely.

example.ex: Luke answered by tightening his grip on her shoulder...
example.tran: 卢克的回应就是把她的肩头抓得更紧了。

example.ex: Her arms tightened about his neck in gratitude...
example.tran: 她充满感激，把他的脖子搂得更紧了。

entry.def: If you tighten a rope or chain, or if it tightens, it is stretched or pulled hard until it is straight.

example.ex: The anchorman flung his whole weight back, tightening the rope...
example.tran: 那个压阵队员使尽了全身力气往后拽，把绳子拉得紧紧的。

example.ex: The cables tightened and he was lifted gradually from the deck.
example.tran: 缆绳绷紧了，他被慢慢地吊离了甲板。

entry.def: If a government or organization tightens its grip on a group of people or an activity, or if its grip tightens, it begins to have more control over it.

example.ex: He knows he has considerable support for his plans to tighten his grip on the machinery of central government...
example.tran: 他清楚有相当多的人支持他对中央政府机构加强控制的计划。

example.ex: As the regime's grip on the mainland tightened over the next few years, hundreds of thousands more people fled south.
example.tran: 随着后来几年那个政权加强对大陆的控制，又有数十万人逃往南方。

entry.tran: 拧紧，旋紧(螺钉、螺丝帽等)
entry.def: When you tighten a screw, nut, or other device, you turn it or move it so that it is more firmly in place or holds something more firmly.

example.ex: I used my thumbnail to tighten the screw on my lamp...
example.tran: 我用拇指指甲把台灯上的螺钉拧紧了。

example.ex: All the bolts were fully tightened.

entry.tran: (身体局部)变僵硬，产生憋闷感，产生阻塞感
entry.def: If a part of your body tightens, the muscles in it become tense and stiff, for example because you are angry or afraid.

example.ex: Sofia's throat had tightened and she couldn't speak...
example.tran: 索菲娅喉咙哽住了，说不出话来。

example.ex: She saw his jaw tighten and his face lose its colour.
example.tran: 她看见他的下巴绷紧，脸色煞白。

entry.tran: 使(规定、政策、制度)更加严格；使更加有效
entry.def: If someone in authority tightens a rule, a policy, or a system, they make it stricter or more efficient.

example.ex: The United States plans to tighten the economic sanctions currently in place...
example.tran: 美国计划加大现有经济制裁的力度。

example.ex: They have tightened security along the border...
example.tran: 他们加强了边境的安全工作。

auth_sentence.content: But they need to tighten up at the back.
auth_sentence.res_content: But they need to tighten up at the back.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But they need to tighten up at the back.

auth_sentence.content: It'll tighten people up and stress them out.
auth_sentence.res_content: It'll tighten people up and stress them out.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It'll tighten people up and stress them out.

auth_sentence.content: Facebook has agreed to tighten up its privacy policies.
auth_sentence.res_content: Facebook has agreed to tighten up its privacy policies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Facebook has agreed to tighten up its privacy policies.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"变成"; 2. 表形容词,"由……制成的",通常加在名词后面; 3. 表名词,"人或物"

stems_affixes.word_buile: strait海峡,困难+en变成→adj.艰难的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: gold金+en由……制成的→adj.金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
oak橡树+en由……制成的→adj.橡木制的
wax蜡+en由……制成的→adj.蜡的,蜡制的
wood木头+en由……制成的→adj.木制的;呆笨的
wool羊毛+en由……制成的→adj. 羊毛[制]的;毛纺的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
chick小鸡+en人或物→n.鸡肉;鸡,小鸡,小鸟
city城市+en人或物→citizen
heath荒野,树丛+en人或物→n.异教徒
kit=cat猫+en人或物→kitten
maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
vix雌狐+en人或物→n.雌狐,泼妇
ward守卫,看守+en人或物→n.看守人,管理员
bright明亮的+en变成→v.[使]变亮,[使]愉快
broad宽+en变成→v.放宽,变阔
damp潮湿+en变成→v.[使]潮湿,使沮丧,泼凉水
dark黑+en变成→v.[使]变黑[变暗]
fright惊骇,吃惊+en变成→v.使惊吓;惊恐
hast匆忙+en变成→v.催促 v.赶紧
length长,长度+en变成→v.延长,[使]变长
sharp尖+en变成→v.削尖,使敏锐
short短+en变成→v.弄短,缩小,减少
sweet甜+en变成→v.使变甜 v.变甜
threat恐吓,凶兆,威胁I+en变成→v.恐吓,威胁
tight紧的+en变成→v.变紧,绷紧,拉紧
wake叫醒+en变成→v.醒来 v.唤醒
weak弱的+en变成→v.削弱,[使]变弱

Sentence.sentence: They had to tighten their belts.

sentences.en: Border police tightened controls on tourists.
sentences.cn: 边防警察加紧对旅游者的管制。

sentences.en: In wartime everyone has to tighten their belts.
sentences.cn: 战争时期大家都必须省吃俭用。

sentences.en: We’ll have to tighten our belts if we want to save any money for our holidays this year.
sentences.cn: 我们要想攒点钱今年去度假，就得勒紧腰带。
